revisions.rev:
'''EPM''' may refer to:
== Education == * [[Ecole Polytechnique de Montreal]], an engineering school in Canada
== Science and technology == * Electronic protective measures; see [[Electronic counter-countermeasures]] * Electropositive metal; see [[Electropositive shark repellent]] * [[Elevated plus maze]], a rodent model of anxiety * [[Equine Protozoal Myeloencephalitis]], a neurological disease that affects horses * [[European Physiology Modules]], a payload for the International Space Station * [[Evolved psychological mechanism]], an aspect of a human or other animal's psychology
== Literature and humanities == * [[Economic and Philosophical Manuscripts of 1844|''Economic and Philosophical Manuscripts'' of 1844]], an early work of Karl Marx * ''Empiricism and the Philosophy of Mind'', a work of 20th century analytic philosopher [[Wilfrid Sellars]] * ''[[An Enquiry Concerning the Principles of Morals]]'', a book by Scottish enlightenment philosopher David Hume
== Management == * [[Enterprise process management]] * [[Enterprise performance management]], a sub-set of business performance management * [[Enterprise project management]], a field of organizational development
== Other == * ''[[Empresas PÃºblicas de MedellÃ­n]]'', a Colombian company * [[E.P.M.]], a bonus track by [[DragonForce]] from their fourth album [[Ultra Beatdown]].
